remarks: Closure of a group sum in a submonoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumzsubmcl as of 3-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumzsubmclOLD.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzsubmclOLD.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzsubmclOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzsubmclOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzsubmclOLD.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
gsumzsubmclOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
gsumzsubmclOLD.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzsubmclOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumzsubmclOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. S ) $.
